name: yek (mohsen1)
description: [项目级] A fast Rust based tool to serialize text-based files in a repository or directory for LLM consumption。来源: https://github.com/mohsen1/yek

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A fast Rust based tool to serialize text-based files in a repository or directory for LLM consumption

来源: https://github.com/mohsen1/yek
语言: Rust
Stars: 2426

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: Choose the installation method for your platform:

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
ARCHITECTURE.md
CHANGELOG.md
Cargo.lock
Cargo.toml
Formula
Formula/yek.rb
LICENSE
Makefile
README.md
bench.toml
benches
benches/serialization.rs
cliff.toml
scripts
scripts/ailoop.ts
scripts/install_yek.ps1
scripts/install_yek.sh
scripts/make-release.sh
src
src/category.rs

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content: `yek` has sensible defaults, you can simply run `yek` in a directory to serialize the entire repository. It will serialize all files in the repository and write them into a temporary file. The path to the file will be printed to the console.
